title: cMOOC Learners and Cognitive Network Development: Connectivist Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and foundational social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Case analysis of cMOOCs applying connectivist learning theory in a smartphone-based restricted technological environment and acquisition of cognitive network-building strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain cognitive network development stages in a cMOOC environment
Learners can design interaction strategies based on Connectivist learning theory
Learners can compare cognitive network characteristics by learner type (success/failure, long-term/short-term)
Learners can establish and execute effective learning strategies in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
